arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona starting XI against Valencia | La Liga
arts.sum: FC Barcelona are set to kick off their game against Valencia soon. arts.sum: FC Barcelona announced the starting lineup for their home game against Valencia minutes ago, with some rotations being made by manager Hansi Flick. The biggest news was that Roony Bardghji was handed his debut, starting on the right flank in the injury-enforced absence of Lamine Yamal.
